m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Switch Assemblies and Method for Controlling Vehicular Components United States Patent Application 20070096565 Kind                 Code: A1 Abstract: Vehicle including a switch assembly includes a vehicular component subject to control by an occupant in the passenger compartment, and a switch assembly for controlling the component based on pressure applied by the occupant of the vehicle to an exposed surface of the vehicle. The switch assembly includes at least one wireless transmission component arranged to wirelessly transmit an indication of the application
